edu.neu.ccs.cs5004.assignment3.problem2

接口 Employee

  • 所有已知子接口:
    IhrManager, ILawyer, ILegalSecretary, Secretary
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractEmployee, AbstractSecretary, GeneralSecretary, HrManager, Lawyer, LegalSecretary

    public interface Employee
    Represents an employee in a law firm.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Salary addBonus(Integer amt)
      Add bonus to an employee's salary.
      Salary[] addBonusEmployees(Employee[] employees, Integer amt)
      Add bonus to several employees'employees salaries.

      Get the extra vacation an employee can have.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        Name getName()
        Getter for property 'Name'.
        返回:
        Value for property 'Name'.

      • getWorkload

        Integer getWorkload()
        Getter fot the property "Workload".
        返回:
        workload value.

      • getPaidVacation

        Integer getPaidVacation()
        Getter fot the property "PaidVacation".
        返回:
        paid vacation days value.

      • getEmployeeId

        String getEmployeeId()
        Getter fot the property "employeeId".
        返回:
        employee ID

      • uniqueBehavior

        String uniqueBehavior()
        Get the unique behavior of an employee
        返回:
        a string represented the unique behavior of an employee.

      • getServedYear

        Integer getServedYear()
        Getter fot the property 'ServedYear'..
        返回:
        served years in this company

      • extraVacation

        Integer extraVacation()
        Get the extra vacation an employee can have. Lawyer, HR Manager and Legal Secretary can get 2 more vacation days pei served in this company. General Secretary don't have extra vacations.
        返回:
        the extra vacation days for employee

      • addBonus

        Salary addBonus(Integer amt)
        Add bonus to an employee's salary. Employee can requested to HR Manager of increasing salary. If agreed, the salary will increase byamt.If not, the salary remains the same.
        参数:
        amt - the amount need to be increased
        返回:
        the salary after an increase salary request

      • addBonusEmployees

        Salary[] addBonusEmployees(Employee[] employees,
                           Integer amt)
        Add bonus to several employees'employees salaries. Employee can requested to HR Manager of increasing salary. If agreed, the salary of all employees will increase byamt.If not, the salary remains the same.
        参数:
        employees - array of several employees
        amt - the amount need to be increased
        返回:
        the array of salary after an increase salary request

      • getEmployeeSalary

        Salary getEmployeeSalary()
        Get an employee's salary.
        返回:
        the salary of an employee
